This technique allows [[Orochimaru]] to control the [[Sword of Kusanagi (Orochimaru)|Sword of Kusanagi]]. As he moves his fingers, the Sword of Kusanagi makes the same movements, even to the point of moving in the air. This allows him to continue using the sword even if he's been disarmed of it, wielding it against opponents and, because of the sword's natural sharpness, easily cutting through them.<ref name="d2"/> The sword moves quickly while airborne, allowing Orochimaru to direct it at opponents from behind before it can be defended against.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 123</ref> In the anime, the sword's blade emits a bright blue light when controlled in this way.<ref>''Naruto'' episode 73</ref>
